title: [BUG] segfault when starting owl
body:
log:

builds before f49aea0 do not segfault
author: sadlerm4

comments.body: try of the latest commit. i suppose you did not have your outputs in the config, and that caused a null pointer dereference.

apologies, i haven't seen the latest changes to examples/example.conf and i was using default.conf as a reference.

you're absolutely right, i didn't set outputs - cheers:)
no need to apologize, it was an actual issue - it is supposed to autowire the outputs if they are not present in the config. it should now.
